Source.Name: powertop
Source.Summary: PowerTOP is a Linux tool to diagnose issues with power consumption and power management.
Source.Description: PowerTOP is a Linux tool to diagnose issues with power consumption and power management. In addition to being a diagnostic tool, PowerTOP also has an interactive mode where the user can experiment various power management settings for cases where the Linux distribution has not enabled these settings.
